original_text: And I will set my face against that man; I will make him a sign and a byword and cut him off from the midst of my people, and you shall know that I am the Lord.
korean_text: 그 사람을 대적하여 그들을 놀라움과 표징과 속담 거리가 되게 하여 내 백성 가운데에서 끊으리니 내가 여호와인 줄을 너희가 알리라

sentences.original_text: And I will set my face against that man
I will make him a sign and a byword
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그를 표적과 속담이 되게 하리라

sentences.original_text: and cut him off from the midst of my people
and you shall know that I am the Lord.
